fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Culture, Education and training, Youth, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society
inter_groups: EU-China Economics and Politics Institute focuses on EU-China Business Summit, EU-China Higher Education, EU-China University-Business Co-operation and Combination
eu_initiatives: The EU-China Relations, International Law and IOs (NATO Studies, OSCE Studies, OECD Studies), higher education, University-Business Co-operation and Combination
organisation_name: EU-China Economics and Politics Institute (EU China EPI)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication: The EU-China Economics and Politics institute is constantly creating research publications on the EU-China relations, International Law and IOs (NATO Studies, OSCE Studies, OECD Studies), and higher educational topics. A team of skilled researcher and university professors is constantly engaged in the study of current issues. Our institute is realising a series of conference during the year with a strong focus on bilateral relations and integration.
goals__remit: The EU-China Economics and Politics Institute is designed to encourage, improve and strengthen EU-China relations, and to extend communication and cooperation as an independent think-tank. Currently the EU-China Economics and Politics Institute cooperates with Webster University (Athens Campus) in Master Programme for the EU-China Relations, and the summer school for EU-China Relations. Furthermore the EU-China Economics and Politics Institute maintains cooperation with Skoda University and Faculty of Social Science of the Charles University in Prague. Annually the EU-China Economics and Politics Institute organizes the EU-China Policy Talk Seminar and the Issues and Studies International Conference. Last but not least, the EU-China Economics and Politics Institute eyes on Kosovo situation and starts to cooperate with Chamber of Commerce, Kosovo to organize the Kosovo Forum to promote Kosovo economy.
